body:
<Armstrong: We’re not.

<Mother: Don’t argue! And put on a damn coat!

<Armstrong: FINE. (tiny tiny text) goooooood…

(Panel3)- 

<Mother: and bring another American flag from the office. A-and ma-mak-make su-sure-

<Armstrong: HAHAHA! You crying now?!

(Panel 4)-

<Mother: SHUT UP! I just want you to actually care-

<Armstrong: it was a bad joke, I apologize... you keep me going.

(Panel5)-

<Mother: … you’re so hot when you apologize *sloppy kiss*

<Armstrong: mmmmurica never truly apologizes~

[okay I’m done, too tired, aaaand too much energy right now for something no one’s gonna read but hopefully you liked it a bit… oh god no one’s gonna know how the fuck to read without being confused- DAMMIT!]

[sorry, for some reason the site won’t allow paragraphs, I’ll do the next best thing]

<Mother: OH I SWEAR TO GOD- WE JUST TALKED ABOUT THIS!!

(Panel 3)- 



<Armstrong: Raiden is too much of a woke millennial leftist commie for me to let him live on America’s rich green grass!

<Chris-kun: (small text) didn’t you replace our front lawn with fake grass?


<Mother: AND SO WHAT IF HE IS- 


(Panel 4)- 


<Armstrong: I have to do what’s right for America, honey. I have to turn that Marxist into a football. 

<Mother: but, Chris-Kun- 

<Armstrong: Oh please! 

[page 3]

(Panel 1) 

<Armstrong: this little *insert racial and/or mentally insensitive slur here* doesn’t need to fret about flesh wounds, right *repeat racial and/or mental illness slur*?

<Chris-Kun: … yeah. 

(Panel2)-

<Mother: DAMMIT, let’s at least talk about this when you get back. 

<Armstrong: no. 

<Mother: Armstrong, we’re dealing with this instead of bottling it up unhealthily-

MY re-edit of the first bit of dialogue

Page 1-

Panel 1-

mother: Armstong, you seriously have to stop hitting Chris-Kun so har- (next bubble) are you seriously ignoring me?

Panel2-

Armstrong- yeah.

Mother: (to Chris-kun) oh poor Chris-Kun, it’s not showing up too much at least…

Chris-Kun: I’m fine…


Panel3-

Mother: seriously, if you wanna train him you should at least-


Armstrong: He needs to learn the hard way, no time for half-assed pansies in my household.

Panel4-

Box: “that mug… means she wants full on BDSM tonight…”

Page 2-

Panel 1-

Box-“there was one before that said ‘live laugh love’ but Armstrong said it was too feminist for him and chucked it out the window… I was outside that window.”

Mother: -I mean WHAT THE HELL DID WE TALK ABOUT IN THERAPY?! You CANNOT TALK TO ME THAT-

Armstrong: Can it woman!


Panel 2-


Armstong: President said I have to make an example out of Raiden in a few hours.

(Part 1)
Her mother became the cutest & hottest thing in the same time. But really, Ernie & Bert XD
This rewrite is so stupid it's hilarious.
Why did they change the names to something so stupid ruins a great work
Im laughing  because the dads name is bert and the kids name is ernie,too funny
